en.privacy.title: Privacy Policy
en.privacy.introduction.title: 1. Introduction
en.privacy.introduction.text: Citadel VPN is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and your rights in relation to it. Our guiding principle is to collect only the minimal data required to operate a world-class VPN service. We are a strict no-logs VPN provider.
en.privacy.infoWeDoNotCollect.title: 2. Information We Do Not Collect
en.privacy.infoWeDoNotCollect.text: We DO NOT collect, log, or store any of the following:
en.privacy.infoWeCollect.title: 3. Information We Collect
en.privacy.infoWeCollect.text: To provide our Services, we collect the following minimal information:
en.privacy.infoWeCollect.accountInfo.title: 3.1. Account Information
We collect your email address to create and manage your account, process payments, and communicate with you.
We use third-party payment processors (e.g., Cryptomus) to handle payments. We do not store your full credit card information.
en.privacy.infoWeCollect.usageStats.title: 3.2. Aggregated Usage Statistics
en.privacy.infoWeCollect.usageStats.item1.r: We collect information about whether you have successfully established a VPN connection on a particular day (but not a specific time).
en.privacy.infoWeCollect.usageStats.item2.r: We collect the total amount of data transferred by a given user to ensure fair use and maintain service quality.
en.privacy.infoWeCollect.usageStats.note: This data is aggregated and cannot be used to identify any individual user or their specific activities.
en.privacy.infoWeCollect.telegramBot.title: 3.3. Telegram Bot
en.privacy.infoWeCollect.telegramBot.text.r: may collect your Telegram user ID to associate it with your Citadel VPN account. This is necessary to provide the Service through Telegram.
en.privacy.howWeUse.title: 4. How We Use Your Information
en.privacy.howWeUse.text: We use the information we collect to:
en.privacy.howWeUse.item1: Provide, operate, and maintain our Services.
en.privacy.howWeUse.item2: Process your payments and manage your subscription.
en.privacy.howWeUse.item3: Communicate with you, including sending service-related updates and responding to your support requests.
en.privacy.howWeUse.item4: Prevent fraud and abuse of our Services.
en.privacy.protection.title: 5. How We Protect Your Information
en.privacy.protection.text: We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. All payment transactions are processed through a gateway provider and are not stored or processed on our servers.
en.privacy.dataRetention.title: 6. Data Retention
en.privacy.dataRetention.text: We retain your account information for as long as your account is active. You can request the deletion of your account and associated data at any time.

en.aboutUs.title: About Us
en.aboutUs.ourMission.title: Our Mission: Your Digital Freedom Fortress
en.aboutUs.ourMission.text: In an era where digital surveillance and censorship are on the rise, we believe that everyone has a right to a free and open internet. Our mission is to provide you with a powerful, secure, and easy-to-use tool to protect your online privacy and bypass restrictions. Citadel VPN is your fortress in the digital world.
en.aboutUs.whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
en.aboutUs.whoWeAre.text: We are a team of privacy advocates, cybersecurity experts, and technology enthusiasts dedicated to building a better internet. We were founded on the principles of privacy, security, and freedom. We believe that your data is your own, and we are committed to protecting it.
en.aboutUs.whatWeDo.title: What We Do
en.aboutUs.whatWeDo.text: Citadel VPN provides a state-of-the-art VPN service built on the modern and efficient VLESS protocol. Our service is designed to be fast, reliable, and secure, allowing you to browse the web without borders. We are a Telegram-first service, offering a seamless and intuitive user experience through our powerful Telegram bot. This allows for quick and easy setup, management of your subscription, and access to our global network of servers.
en.aboutUs.ourValues.title: Our Values
en.aboutUs.ourValues.item1.regular: Your privacy is our top priority. We have a strict no-logs policy, meaning we never track, store, or share your online activity.
en.aboutUs.ourValues.item2.regular: We use military-grade encryption and the latest VPN protocols to keep your data safe from prying eyes.
en.aboutUs.ourValues.item3.regular: We believe in an open internet for everyone. Our service helps you bypass censorship and access the content you want, wherever you are.
en.aboutUs.ourValues.item4.regular: We are committed to being open and honest with our users. We believe that trust is earned through transparency.
en.aboutUs.whyChoose.title: Why Choose Citadel VPN?
en.aboutUs.whyChoose.item1.regular: We use the VLESS protocol, which is designed for performance and security.
en.aboutUs.whyChoose.item2.regular: Manage your VPN directly from Telegram, one of the world's most popular and secure messaging apps.
en.aboutUs.whyChoose.item3.regular: Access our network of high-speed servers in locations around the world.
en.aboutUs.whyChoose.item4.regular: We never log your activity. Your privacy is guaranteed.
en.aboutUs.whyChoose.item5.regular: Our dedicated support team is always here to help you.
en.aboutUs.joinUs.title: Join Us
en.aboutUs.joinUs.text1: Take control of your digital life. Join the Citadel VPN community and experience the internet without borders.
